Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Ashland.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 75th/Exchange
ShortDescription: SB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Exchange, 79th and South Shore due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Exchange, 79th and South Shore due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Exchange
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates, 79th, South Shore and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Yates, 79th, South Shore and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.
